articles.author: Jillian Kestler-D'Amours, Joseph Stepansky
articles.title: Biden ‘playing with fire’ by redesignating Yemen’s Houthis as ‘terrorists’ - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Advocates say labelling Houthis a ‘global terrorist group’ risks worsening already dire humanitarian crisis in Yemen.
articles.content:
It was one of Joe Bidens first major foreign policy decisions.
Less than a month after taking office in January 2021, the United States president lifted two terrorist designations imposed by his pre… [+8063 chars]

articles.title: Apple Watch sales ban can resume, US appeals court rules - Financial Times
articles.description: Products are at the centre of a legal dispute over patents for health technology
articles.content: A US appeals court has allowed a sales ban to resume on Apples Watch Series 9 and Ultra 2, the latest setback in the technology giants dispute with health technology company Masimo over patents for i… [+2218 chars]

articles.description: Chinese researchers have cloned the first rhesus monkey, a species widely used in medical research because its physiology is similar to humans. They say they...

articles.title: Pattern recognition in the nucleation kinetics of non-equilibrium self-assembly - Nature.com
articles.description: Examination of nucleation during self-assembly of multicomponent structures illustrates how ubiquitous molecular phenomena inherently classify high-dimensional patterns of concentrations in a manner similar to neural network computation.
